channel.title: Creating Highscores
channel.description:
Ok how do I create a simple highscores in-game. For example, when I type ::highscores I want something to popup saying Names of people and Total level.
Example.... Billy types ::highscores [u]Highscores[/u] [u]Username[/u] [u]Total Level[/u] 1. Magic 2079 2. Pker 1999 3. Zezima 967
Etc.... Anyone help?

item.title: Creating Highscores
item.dc:creator: @j19283746 j19283746
item.description:
@j19283746 wrote:

Ok how do I create a simple highscores in-game. For example, when I type ::highscores
I want something to popup saying Names of people and Total level.

Example…
Billy types ::highscores Highscores
Username Total Level
1. Magic 2079
2. Pker 1999
3. Zezima 967

Etc… Anyone help?

Read full topic
